sentences.sContent: You are one of us. You are a swan!
sentences.sContent_eng: You are one of us. You are a swan!
sentences.sCn: 你是我们中的一个。你是一只天鹅！

sentences.sContent: Toads pursuit of swans, swan disdain said: If I as long as you die!
sentences.sContent_eng: Toads pursuit of swans, swan disdain said: If I as long as you die!
sentences.sCn: 癞蛤蟆追求天鹅，天鹅不屑地说：我要是长成你这样早去死了！

phrases.pCn: 绝笔，最后的作品；天鹅临死时的叫声

trans.tranOther: a large white bird with a long neck that lives on rivers and lakes
